oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Effect of doping Ca on polaron hopping in LaSr2Mn2O7
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: BHATIA, SN
YASSIN, OA
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: lasr2mn2o7 manganite
ca doping
polaron hopping
activation energy
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: From the transport studies in the bilayer manganites LaSr2-xCaxMn2O7, we have found the variable-range hopping model proposed by Viret et al to be inadequate to describe the transport of charge in these materials. The polarons appear to hop to their nearest neighbors with an activation energy, which in part is dependent on the magnetic interactions in the lattice.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: International Symposium on Advances in Superconductivity and Magnetism: Materials, Mechanisms, and Devices (ASMM2D-2001),MUMBAI, INDIA,SEP 25-28, 2001
